title: L'Herbivore
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Fast food, German
description: An all-vegan food court restaurant offering 5-6 different sandwiches and burgers with ever-changing creations. Centerpiece of the store is a large fresh food counter, to be sold in the self-produced seitan lupine compositions. The product range of Hack spans Bratstucke and strips to cold cuts. The ingredients are 100% organic and locally sourced.
